website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one card reader and printer. You won't find a reader like this for a better price and this is great for small shops.
pros: Includes a thermal roll printer that prints quickly
Features IP connectivity via WiFi with dial-up as a backup
Can process ATM, debit, EBT, and check payments
cons: A new terminal ID must be set up over the phone with First Data, which can be time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: Save $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I honestly saved around $600 buying this through Amazon, our old F-50 was on it's death bed and we needed a machine ASAP, I received it in two days. The setup with First Data was simple; however; took a little longer than I anticipated. I cannot attest to the WIFI feature as we do not use it, we are a medical facility and abide by the security requirements. Either way it works great and if you want to save $$$ buy it though Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss, but good product if it's a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered two of these--one for each office my company has. The one at our main location works fine and was easy to set up/connect to WiFi. The other one won't connect to WiFi and won't print receipts properly. We returned it with no issues and ordered a new one; review will be updated if the terminal works fine. Overall, it's a great machine--we just received poor results with the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ruechel

customer_reviews.title: works great once programmed
customer_reviews.text: way cheaper than what my provider was asking for the same unit! it works great, no issues. be prepared to be on the phone for awhile though... BofA took almost 3 hours to get it going for us- not the FD130's fault at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F.

customer_reviews.title: Fast service and Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: This terminal arrived quickly and we saved over $450.00 by buying it on amazon. It was amazingly easy to set up with help from First Data/Bank of America Card Services. It took a little time for the download but the person in tech was great and patient. We love the machine. It has quickened our time on our transactions dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelledaddy

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen goes bad. It becomes a brick and you cant close ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth of the same product. Touch screen goes bad. It becomes a brick and you cant close out. U have to call in for manual closing. First Data doesnt offer warranty to fix. My processor doesnt offer any alternative option. I hate touch screen terminal!!
customer_reviews.author: Agoojjim

customer_reviews.title: Pre-authorizations are not as easy as our old terminal had allowed
customer_reviews.text: Works well but loses terminal connection often. Pre-authorizations are not as easy as our old terminal had allowed. We are not sure if the issues are with the terminal or our service provider.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch & Adfordable
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Does it all chip, Apple Pay, cards. And great price! The bank wanted to charge nearly twice as much but had no problem setting this up.
customer_reviews.author: NY Steve

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Sturdy and Easy to Use.
customer_reviews.text: Bombproof. It just works and it works every time. Setup through my merchant processor was a hassle because the person on the phone was new and got a lot of the setup information wrong. But that's the processor's issue, not the machine's. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Did not include adequate instructions, particularly for setting up ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not include adequate instructions, particularly for setting up WiFi. Techies at First Data walked me through setup, and after a couple of tweaks, the unit operates as expected. Have not yet had an opportunity to try a chip card.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: SAVE SOME MONEY AND BUY FROM AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Saved a lot of money buying this from Amazon and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shah Afaq

customer_reviews.title: No Pin Debit Key Injection
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize that the terminal does not have pin debit key injection. If you need pin debit you'll have to buy an external pin pad.
customer_reviews.author: Khai Pham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works like a charm and half the price the merchant services charges
customer_reviews.author: Erika Gullette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my business
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my business. Very happy, easy download, super easy to use with touch screen features. Takes the chip too.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Saves money!
customer_reviews.text: Saved a lot of money over ordering it directly from our bank. It did take over 2 hours on the phone to set it up, but was well worth it for the savings. So far, it is working great!
customer_reviews.author: Summersill

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: This is the one we all need, it reads credit card chip as well as u can swipe the card that is nor chip ready yet. Yes it was a painful experience programming the new machine with first data but it's now working well and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: fahed D.

customer_reviews.title: FD-130 Terminal
customer_reviews.text: Worked flawlessly out of the box and I was able to activate within 15 mins of working with my processing company's representative (First Data).
customer_reviews.author: Gamma

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS ITEM FROM THIS COMPANY. ALL FEATURES ...
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS ITEM FROM THIS COMPANY. ALL FEATURES OF THE MACHINE DO NOT WORK AND THE COMPANY WILL NOT RETURN OR HELP YOU. BE AWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amjid

customer_reviews.title: Not best quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this machine a few months and the card swiper has already quit working. Have to manually enter the numbers if a chip isn’t available
customer_reviews.author: MELEAH S SEGARS

customer_reviews.title: Good terminal. The only things that aren't great is
customer_reviews.text: Good terminal. The only things that aren't great is. Gives off alot of paper for receipts, and beeps alot.
customer_reviews.author: Patty T.

customer_reviews.title: expiration date 1 year on print head
customer_reviews.text: print head doesnt really last long so just a heads up
customer_reviews.author: Luc1f3r

customer_reviews.title: WiFi works and it's nice but it is slow when you share with tens ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this new but it network settings is buggy: DHCP/Static IP doesn't work properly. WiFi works and it's nice but it is slow when you share with tens of other user on the same network. Pin pad is optional, so it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kiet Le

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a very terminal, and without any problem to download and processing.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Duran

customer_reviews.title: pain in the ass set up with first data
customer_reviews.text: pain in the ass set up with first data 3/ 1/2 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Vest

customer_reviews.title: Good product - 4 star
customer_reviews.text: 4 star because I had few to reset machine few times
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get up and running after a quick programming step by my merchant processor (First Data)
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Curran

customer_reviews.title: The best deal and fastest shipping
customer_reviews.text: The best deal and fastest shipping. I love ❤️ ❤️❤️❤️❤️This people. 👍 After I got the machine i programit in 10 minutes and back in business
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terminal works great and paid way better price . Thx,I save so much
customer_reviews.author: Bling Box

customer_reviews.title: works great. Saved me over $500
customer_reviews.text: works great.Saved me over $500.00.was fully loadable with First Data processing.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my hpc hookah store
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much fast shipping and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Hpchookah

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to use and great machine
customer_reviews.text: I am using this machine for 5 months. It’s very easy to use and great machine. I didn’t face any error message so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ketan Maisuria

customer_reviews.title: Great Terminal.
customer_reviews.text: Great Terminal. I replaced our old FD-50 terminal that we were having daily problems with. Not one problem transmitting in months. Love it. Plus we are now ahead of the curve for the new chip cards.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lomazzo

customer_reviews.title: LOUSY MACHINE! WELLS FARGO TOLD ME IT DID NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: LOUSY MACHINE! WELLS FARGO TOLD ME IT DID NOT MEET THEIR SECURITY STANDARDS. THEY ASKED ME TO SHIP IT TO THEM AND FOR $150.00 THEY WOULD PROGRAM IT TO THEIR REQUIRED STANDARDS. THIS MACHINE IS NOT READY TO PLUG AND USE.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard D.

customer_reviews.title: Sent back and new unit was fine.
customer_reviews.text: FD-35 EMV would not accept pin number. Sent back and new unit was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

product_meta.title: First Data FD130 Terminal with WiFi
product_meta.description: Compact design, Windows CE 6.0; speedy ARM9 400Mhz CPU Processing capabilities for ATM, debit, electronic benefits transfer (EBT) transactions and check payments, Fast printer capable of 15 lines per second IP connectivity with dial-up as a backup and Wi-Fi as an additional option Three USB ports, 2.25-inch-wide thermal roll printer. Unused, Unlocked, Ready for any First Data Processor.
feature_bullets: Compact design, Windows CE 6.0; speedy ARM9 400Mhz CPU
Processing capabilities for ATM, debit, electronic benefits transfer (EBT) transactions and check payments, Fast printer capable of 15 lines per second
IP connectivity with dial-up as a backup and Wi-Fi as an additional option
Three USB ports, 2.25-inch-wide thermal roll printer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
